title: Number of Days in Month
description: In this lab, we will delve into a JavaScript programming exercise that aims to determine the number of days in a given month of a specified year. Through this lab, you will learn how to use the Date constructor and the getDate() method to calculate the number of days in a month. You will also get a chance to practice your JavaScript skills and gain a better understanding of how date calculations work in JavaScript.

meta.title: Determine the Number of Days in a Month with JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to use JavaScript to calculate the number of days in a given month and year.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, calendar, javascript tutor, javascript practice online, days in month, programming tutorial, javascript lab, date

verify.name: Verify Node Commands In Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 一个月的天数
i18n.description: 在这个实验中，我们将深入探讨一个JavaScript编程练习，旨在确定指定年份中给定月份的天数。通过这个实验，你将学习如何使用Date构造函数和getDate()方法来计算一个月中的天数。你还将有机会练习你的JavaScript技能，并更好地理解JavaScript中的日期计算是如何工作的。

meta.title: 用JavaScript确定一个月的天数
meta.description: 学习如何使用JavaScript计算给定月份和年份中的天数。
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript练习, 日历, javascript教程, 在线javascript练习, 一个月的天数, 编程教程, javascript实验, 日期

verify.name: 在Zsh历史记录中验证Node命令
verify.hint: 通过输入'node'并按Enter键，可以在终端/SSH中运行JavaScript。
